segment.name: Beginning of message
segment.documentation: BGM, A segment to indicate the beginning of the message and to transmit function, type and number of the message.

segment.name: Directory identification
segment.documentation: DII, A segment specifying the identity of the directory set and giving its language and maintenance operation.

segment.name: Date/time/period
segment.documentation: DTM, A segment specifying dates related to the directory set, such as date of approval, date of submission or WP.4 acceptance date.

segment.name: Free text
segment.documentation: FTX, A segment providing free text information related to the directory set.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 1: A group of segments identifying the parties involved in the transaction with associated information.

segment.name: Name and address
segment.documentation: NAD, A segment identifying the parties involved in the transaction, e.g. originator, requestor or secretariat.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 2: A group of segments identifying a person or a department and identifying communication type(s) and number(s).

segment.name: Contact information
segment.documentation: CTA, A segment identifying a person or a department for the party specified in the leading NAD segment to whom the communication should be directed.

segment.name: Communication contact
segment.documentation: COM, A segment identifying communication type(s) and number(s) of person(s) or department(s) specified in the associated CTA segment.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 3: A group of segments providing a message type directory.

segment.name: Message type identification
segment.documentation: MSG, A segment identifying a message type to be specified.

segment.name: Free text
segment.documentation: FTX, A segment providing textual information related to the message type, namely: message type name, Introduction, Scope, Functional definition, Principles, References and Terms and definitions.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 4: A group of segments specifying a message type structure and its related functional definition.

segment.name: Segment usage details
segment.documentation: SGU, A segment specifying the usage of a segment in a message type structure.

segment.name: Free text
segment.documentation: FTX, A segment providing textual information about segment usage. This information comprises part of the 'Data segment clarification' section.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 5: A group of segments identifying a segment group and providing details about segment group usage.

segment.name: Segment group usage details
segment.documentation: GRU, A segment specifying the usage of a segment group in a message type structure.

segment.name: Free text
segment.documentation: FTX, A segment providing the textual information about segment group usage. This information comprises part of the 'Data Segment Clarification' section.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 6: A group of segments providing a segment directory.

segment.name: Segment identification
segment.documentation: SEG, A segment identifying a segment type and specifying its class and maintenance operation.

segment.name: Free text
segment.documentation: FTX, A segment specifying the name and functional definition of a segment type.

segment.name: Data element usage details
segment.documentation: ELU, A segment specifying the contents of data elements in a segment type.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 7: A group of segments providing a composite data element directory.

segment.name: Composite data element identification
segment.documentation: CMP, A segment identifying a composite data element and specifying its class and maintenance operation.

segment.name: Free text
segment.documentation: FTX, A segment specifying the name and functional definition of a composite data element type.

segment.name: Data element usage details
segment.documentation: ELU, A segment specifying component data elements in a composite data element and its related information.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 8: A group of segments providing a data element directory.

segment.name: Simple data element details
segment.documentation: ELM, A segment identifying a simple data element and giving related information.

segment.name: Free text
segment.documentation: FTX, A segment specifying the name and functional definition of a simple data element.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 9: A group of segments providing a code list directory.

segment.name: Code set identification
segment.documentation: CDS, A segment specifying a code set. In DIRDEF data element 9434 shall not be used.

segment.name: Free text
segment.documentation: FTX, A segment providing textual information related to the code list.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 10: A group of segments specifying a code value and its functional definition.

segment.name: Code value definition
segment.documentation: CDV, A segment specifying a code value.

segment.name: Free text
segment.documentation: FTX, A segment specifying the name and functional definition of a code value.
